Name: Keqing
Title: "Driving Thunder" Keqing
Desc: She can build decks heretofore not conceived and win battles in which victory is unthinkable.
Source: Reward for inviting Keqing to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

C114031.Name: Lightning Stiletto
C114031.Desc: $[K1]: Switch your $[A1403] in to be the active character and immediately use $[S14032] once. This instance of $[S14032] will grant $[A1403] <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1002]</color> without creating another Lightning Stiletto.\n(When $[A1403] uses $[S14032] with this card in Hand: Instead of creating another Lightning Stiletto, $[K56] this card and $[A1403] gains <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1002]</color>)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

K1002.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro Infusion</color>
K1002.Desc: When the character to which it is attached to deals {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical Damage</color>, it will be turned into {SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>: 2

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

14033.Name: Starward Sword
14033.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT], deals <color=#FFFFFFFF>3 $[K5]</color> to all opposing characters on standby.

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.
